mail.reminderBod: This is a friendly reminder that Two-factor authentication has been enabled on your account. This means that when logging in, you will need to enter a code generated by your TOTP app, Authy, or via a text message on your phone in addition to entering your usual username and password. Remember to keep your recovery codes in a safe place. You will need one of them to log into your account should you lose access to your mobile device.
mail.reminderSub: Two-factor authentication has been enabled on your account

api.request-throttle-error: Please wait 5 minutes before requesting another token

page.title: Security
page.success: Access successfully revoke, this device will be logged out immediately.

modal.emailModalHeader: Verification required, check your email for a login link.
modal.oneTouchCodeHeader: Input Code from Your Authy App
modal.heading: Two Factor settings
modal.2fa_required: You are required to setup two factor authentication due to your {group} membership.
modal.2fa_required_2: You are required to have two factor authentication due to your {group} membership.
modal.helpQR: Scan the QR code, or manually add the code to Google Authenticator or another TOTP app.
modal.helpPhone: Select your country, enter your phone number, then click "Save Phone"
modal.helpPhone2: You should now receive a text with a code, enter it below and click "submit"
modal.helpAuthy: Select your country, enter your phone number, then click "Setup"
modal.helpAuthy2: You should now either receive a text with instructions to setup Authy, or a notification from your Authy app. Once setup, enter your code below and click "submit"
modal.2fa_help: Type in your SMS or TOTP one-time code.
modal.gate_error: Please wait 5 minutes before requesting another token.
modal.recov_help1: Please save these codes, they will not be shown again!
modal.recov_help2: These are your only way back into your account if you lose access to your phone or TOTP app.

permissions.required: Groups required to have twofactor auth.

settings.help: Get your Account SID and Auth Token from https://twilio.com/console, as well as your phone number from https://twilio.com/console/phone-numbers/incoming
settings.authyHelp: Get your API key and customize your how your forum looks in the Authy app here: https://www.twilio.com/console/authy
settings.emailHelp: Send emails to users when new devices log in.
